about_the_game:
This game is about the real Dracula, the medieval voievode / warlord of Valahia (there are no vampires here). The game is built around key historical events: Dracula's first ascension to the throne of Valahia. Vlad Tepes is held as a political prisoner / hostage at the Ottoman Court when he learns the Hungarians invade Valahia, killed his family and offer the throne to their own servant. In response, sultan Murad sends Dracula with an Ottoman army to take his rightful throne and stop Valahia from joining another crusade. Traveling from the Ottoman Capital of Edirne, Dracula arrives at the Wallachian border, at the Giurgiu Castle

A game by Tiberius

content_descriptors.notes: You play as Vlad "the Impaler" Dracula, so impaling and other forms of medieval torture will be seen in the game. The violence, gore, torture and medieval battles are a core part of the game.

short_description: A challenging Classicvania game with an instant death - infinite respawn mechanic (and an "easy" mode). It's tactical: you need to understand each challenge, and time your moves for perfect execution. Easy to learn but hard to master. It's about Vlad the Impaler, the real medieval Dracula.
